fields.label: Using Advanced Custom Fields:
fields.message:
- Each unique "panel" section should be it's own tab (field type > tab) and should be left aligned
- Above the fold section should be labeled "Page Header"
- Below the fold sections should be labeled as "Panel-name" (ex. Panel-Case Results)
- Panel that lives just above the footer (if needed) should be labeled as "Pre-Footer"
- All unnecessary sections should be hidden (ex. content editor, excerpt, etc)
- Use message fields to explain content sections that aren't directly editable in the content editor but still exist on the front end (results, testimonials, etc)
